news.title: Bengaluru civic body's revenue grows by 24.79% in Apr-July 2024
news.para: BBMP Chief Commissioner Tushar Giri Nath explained that three main factors contributed to this rise. “Firstly, defaulters who had not paid for a long time have now contributed ₹184 crore.

news.title: Identification of slum dwellers involves complicated process: SC on functioning of Maharashtra slum areas
news.para: The Supreme Court reviewed the Maharashtra Slum Areas Act, 1971, highlighting complications in identifying slum dwellers. The apex court dismissed Yash Developers' appeal over a prolonged slum redevelopment project in Borivli, imposing a Rs 1 lakh cost. The court emphasized the executive's duty to assess the statute's effectiveness, citing extensive pending litigation as a concern.

news.title: Delhi HC appoints arbitrator to settle dispute between PVR INOX, Ansal Plaza Mall over sealed multiplex
news.para: The Delhi High Court has appointed an arbitrator to resolve the dispute between PVR INOX and Ansal Plaza Mall in Greater Noida. PVR INOX claims that its four-screen multiplex at Ansal Plaza Mall was sealed due to unpaid government dues by the lessor, Sheetal Ansal.

news.title: Uttar Pradesh's nazul property bill sent to select committee
news.para: BJP member and party state president Bhupendra Singh Chaudhary proposed to hand it over to the Select Committee, which should submit its report within two months.

news.title: Omaxe slide show continues post SEBI restriction; hit lower circuit for third day
news.para: Extending its losses for the third consecutive session, Omaxe's shares declined 5 per cent each of Rs 139.15 and 137.40 apiece -- its lower circuit limit -- on the NSE and BSE

news.title: Mahindra & Mahindra sells 20.5-acre land in Mumbai's Kandivali for Rs 210 crore
news.para: Interestingly, the company has sold the property for less than its ready reckoner value or over Rs 223.58 crore. The said land parcel falls under No Development Zone and is bounded by the Sanjay Gandhi National Park on the east and south side.

news.title: Punjab National Bank hikes lending rate by 5 bps across tenors
news.para: ​The benchmark one-year tenor MCLR, which is used to price most consumer loans such as auto and personal, will be at 8.90 per cent against the earlier rate of 8.85 per cent, PNB said in a regulatory filing.

news.title: Jaypee Group taps global credit funds for Rs 10,000 crore to bail out flagship firm
news.para: JAL was admitted for insolvency proceedings on June 3 by the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) following a petition filed by lenders led by ICICI Bank.

news.title: Lansum Properties buys 3.6 acre land in Bengaluru for Rs 200 crore
news.para: Hyderabad-based Lansum Properties has raised Rs 250 crore from IndusInd Bank to finance the project's development, according to the people.

news.title: Aptus Value Housing Finance reports consolidated profit of Rs 171.74 crore in Q1 FY25
news.para: ​The consolidated total income during the quarter under review surged to Rs 404.62 crore, compared to Rs 315.37 crore in the same period last year. For the year ending March 31, 2024 the consolidated total income was at Rs 1,416.84 crore.

news.title: Incuspaze leases 57,000 sq ft in Mumbai
news.para: Mumbai has experienced a significant surge in office space demand, with gross absorption doubling in Q2 2024 compared to Q2 2023.

news.title: Bengaluru metro's green line extension expected to start by October-end
news.para: The extended line, which is part of phase II of Namma Metro has three new stations at Manjunathnagar, Chikkabidarakallu and Madavara.

news.title: Germany's Vonovia posts loss of $573.01 million in H1 2024
news.para: The loss of 529 million euros ($573.01 million) in the six months compares with a loss of 4.13 billion euros in the period a year earlier, and it follows a writedown in the value of its apartments by 1.7% during the first half of the year.

news.title: Omaxe's shares decline for second straight day after SEBI restrictions
news.para: Realty firm Omaxe said it will consider challenging market regulator Sebi's order on Tuesday that barred the company, its Chairman Rohtas Goel, MD Mohit Goel, and three others from the securities market for two years for misrepresentation in the company's financial statements.

news.title: House prices in UK rise by 2.1% in July: Nationwide
news.para: Prices rose 0.3% in July alone to an average of 266,334 pounds ($341,706), and both the monthly and annual increases were slightly greater than economists had forecast in a Reuters poll.

news.title: CBI arrests NBCC's deputy general manager for allegedly taking a bribe
news.para: "During verification of the complaint, the accused DGM demanded higher undue advantage of Rs 11.40 lakh. As such, CBI registered a case against said accused," a CBI spokesperson said in a statement.

news.title: HeidelbergCement India's profit down 23.7% to Rs 39.9 crore in Q1 FY25
news.para: HeidelbergCement India's revenue from operations was down 10.65 per cent to Rs 532.19 crore during the quarter under review, as against Rs 595.64 crore in the corresponding quarter of the previous fiscal.

news.title: Akzo Nobel India posts profit of Rs 114.6 crore in Q1 FY25
news.para: Its revenue from operations was up 3.71 per cent to Rs 1,036.3 crore during the quarter under review. It was Rs 999.2 crore in the corresponding period of the previous fiscal year.

news.title: Bill to vest nazul property back with Uttar Pradesh government after lease ends cleared
news.para: The Bill was tabled by parliamentary affairs minister Suresh Khanna on behalf of CM. It replaces the ordinance promulgated in March this year with the same purpose.
